name: The Chasm of a Thousand Nights

cards.title: The Chasm Of A Thousand Nights
body: At the start of the game, search the environment deck for all nature cards and put them face down beneath this card. Shuffle the environment deck.
Whenever an environment target enters play, put a random card beneath this one into play next to that target.
If a nature ever has no target next to it, put that nature face down beneath this card.

cards.title: Axion
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each villain target 1 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Gul, The Faded Scholar, keeper of{BR}knowledge and wisdom among the djinn,{BR}he has studied both sides of the viel{BR}for ages, fascinated by it all.

cards.title: Beyond the Veil
body: When this card enters play, shuffle all targets from the environment trash into the environment deck.
The first time a hero card is discarded each turn, that hero deals themselves 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Jade's ritual had left a tear in the Veil,{BR}through which the strange fabric of the{BR}djinn realm seeped into the canyon.{BR}Along with the djinn themselves.

cards.title: Crumbling Ruins
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each non-environment target X melee damage, where X is the number of environment targets in play.
cards.flavorText: The summoning chamber began to{BR}collapse, along with the rest of the{BR}ancient city, as the unsummoned djinn{BR}waged war above and around it.

cards.title: Grand Amaraqiel
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 non-environment targets with the highest HP 3 cold damage each.
cards.flavorText: Amaraqiel, The Bitter Emissary. A marid{BR}of the Fourth Circle. It was she who{BR}banished the Breathing Shadow, trapping{BR}him in a corner of the Veil.

cards.title: Gul
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 3 infernal damage.
Whenever this card destroys a target, it deals each target other than itself 1 cold damage.
cards.flavorText: Gul, The Sunless Mask. Shunned even by{BR}its own kind, this spirit's presence{BR}burns the mind and body, although its{BR}intentions are unknown.

cards.title: High Mhegas
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 3 hero targets with the highest HP 2 melee damage each.
cards.flavorText: Mhegas, The Iron Judge. A violent and{BR}powerful djinn who was summoned to{BR}Earth in ancient times and now bears no{BR}love for our world.

cards.title: High Temoq
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 non-environment targets with the lowest HP 2 fire damage each.
cards.flavorText: Temoq, The Imprisoned Flame. A force of{BR}destruction so great that his fellow{BR}djinn were forced to bind him in iron{BR}and exile to save themselves.

cards.title: Ire of the Djinn
body: When this card enters play, 3 players each draw 1 card.
Redirect all damage dealt by environment targets to the hero target with the highest HP. Nature cards cannot redirect this damage.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “You dare draw on the power of our{BR}realm for your own petty gains?”{BR}rasped the icy figure, as Malichae and{BR}Bathiel tried to reason with her.

cards.title: Malevolent
cards.body: Redirect all damage dealt by the target next to this card to the hero target with the highest HP.
cards.flavorText: Mhegas briefly surveyed the conflict{BR}around the Tear. Then he turned{BR}towards the heroes and dove at them,{BR}blade singing. Dawn's forces cheered.
footerBody: Redirect all damage dealt by this target to the hero target with the highest HP.

cards.title: Noxious
cards.body: At the end of the environment turn, the target next to this card deals each hero target 1 toxic damage.
cards.flavorText: “I'm not afraid of shadows,” said Jade,{BR}as the billowing creature drifted{BR}forward, its very presence poisoning{BR}the air around her.
footerBody: At the end of the environment turn, this target deals each hero target 1 toxic damage.

cards.title: Rather Friendly
cards.body: Redirect all damage dealt by the target next to this card to the villain target with the highest HP.
cards.flavorText: Nature spirit and djinn regarded each{BR}other amicably. “You are much quieter{BR}than your fellows,” said the Lady.{BR}“Especially the little bird.”
footerBody: Redirect all damage dealt by this target to the villain target with the highest HP.

cards.title: Surprisingly Agile
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to the target next to this card by 1.
cards.flavorText: Drift aimed a throwing shard at the{BR}angry djinn, but despite its size it was a{BR}blur of motion, dodging ever closer{BR}while flinging icicles at her in turn.
footerBody: Reduce damage dealt to this target by 1.

cards.title: Tevael
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the third highest HP 4 projectile damage.
This card is indestructible while it has more than 0 HP.
cards.flavorText: Tevael, The Buried Warden. He once{BR}guarded the Veil Shardkey, until his{BR}affinity for earthly treasure distracted{BR}him. He has not been seen since.

cards.title: Thieving
cards.body: Whenever the target next to this card deals damage to a hero, that hero must discard a card.
cards.flavorText: “Such pretty trinkets,” Tevael rumbled{BR}to himself in a voice of scraping stone.{BR}Clutching his prize, he sunk out of sight{BR}into the earth.
footerBody: Whenever this target deals damage to a hero, that hero must discard a card.

cards.title: Vicious
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by the target next to this card by 1.
cards.flavorText: Fright Train held his ground as Temoq{BR}took another burning swipe at him. The{BR}djinn's fury was unrelenting: metal{BR}bubbled and sparked at its touch.
footerBody: Increase damage dealt by this target by 1.
